pathfinding-ruler.pathfinderDiagonals.hi: Every other diagonal costs double distance.
pathfinding-ruler.printMoveToChat.name: Print distances to chat
pathfinding-ruler.printMoveToChat.hint: Print distance moved to chat after every move using altered measurement

pathfinding-ruler.GMOnly.hint: If checked, players will not have access to use the tool
